## InvalidProviderError class

Error indicating that the container was able to find a provider, but did not understand the provider type and could not use it to fulfill the dependency.

This should not normally occur, unless custom provider types are in use.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class InvalidProviderError extends BaseError 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [BaseError](./noicejs.baseerror.md)
